pinyin: dian4 nao3 fu3 zhu4 jiao4 cai2

sentences.english: The localization of the definition of significant figures in the current teaching materials is verified with example analyses.
sentences.chinese: 以實例分析了現行教材中有效數字定義的侷限性。

sentences.english: We are able to design and compile teaching materials as customers'needs.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以根據客戶的情況設計和編寫教材。

sentences.english: The third part studies the use of Language Elective high school textbooks published by People's Education Press.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分是人教版高中語文選修教材的使用研究。

sentences.english: Geography teaching material of Hunan version has been used by Zhejiang Province.
sentences.chinese: 浙江省採用了湘教版地理教材。

sentences.english: All textbooks are compiled in English-Chinese edition to facilitate foreign learners.
sentences.chinese: 教材爲雙語版本，以國外學員角度編寫。

sentences.english: Q15: How do I choose good listening materials?
sentences.chinese: 我怎麼選好的聽力教材？

sentences.english: Since September a new book hewing closer to the old style has replaced it.
sentences.chinese: 九月，它就被一本遵守舊樣式的教材取而代之了。

sentences.english: English movies are first-rate supplements but should never be substitutes for textbooks.
sentences.chinese: 電影是口語學習的補充，但代替不了教材。

sentences.english: Two senior English course books are chosen to test the effectiveness of the evaluation framework.
sentences.chinese: 兩本高中英語教材被用來檢測該評估框架的有效性。

sentences.english: What kind of textbook to be choosed is depend on what kind of training goal.
sentences.chinese: 選用哪種教材取決於培養目標。

sentences.english: Zhou Yang has a profound effect on the new Chinese literature theory textbooks.
sentences.chinese: 周揚對新中國文學理論教材影響深遠。

sentences.english: History textbooks have been dumbed down over the past decade.
sentences.chinese: 過去十年間，歷史教材已被修改得過於簡單。

sentences.english: The course materials will be taught through a series of lectures and recitations .
sentences.chinese: 本課程教材將藉由一系列的上課講演與複習方式教授。

sentences.english: whereas for me, it is a completely different, you know, subject material.
sentences.chinese: 但對我來說，這是完全不同的課程教材。

sentences.english: It is very important and necessary for the teachers to have a thorough grasp of mathematics textbook.
sentences.chinese: “喫透”數學教材是十分重要和必要的。

sentences.english: Set up an upper-grade teaching material planning committee. Work slated to begin and wrap up in the summer.
sentences.chinese: 成立高年級教材籌畫小組，於暑假中研發教材。

definition: lesson plan/teaching plan/a "missionary case" (a dispute over Christian missionaries during the late Qing)
courseware (abbr. for 課程軟件|课程软件[ke4 cheng2 ruan3 jian4])
reference book (such as dictionary, almanac, gazetteer etc)
a series of books/a collection of books
